看主播玩然后脑子一抽产生了我上我也行的错觉，过了新手更是觉得我是天生的屠夫霸主，满怀期待地点开匹配，然后啊，然后我被各种凌辱，各种嘲讽，我从他们的眼神中没有看到一丝恐惧，更多的是和打团一样把你围着和各种秀操作，我只有随时消失的痕迹什么也没有。绝大多数人还没见到呢，电机已经亮了两台，看到人又是被戏耍半天，逮不到，绝望非常绝望，然后他们四个满怀好意到你脸上蹲起和照手电，出去一看全是红段，紫色满技能，我只有一个黄色技能。。。这就是匹配嘛，根本没有实力相当的人，把把都是红段把把都是戏耍，一个人挂不上只有可怜的一点血点，升级又要大量，这似乎就陷入了死循环。。。。。。萌新而言，真真切切不推荐这个游戏，人类一个个虽然技术好，但是却没有与之匹配的德。当我玩人类的时候又变成了队友秒倒，屠夫沙穿了的场景，是的，玩人类匹配的人类倒是实力相当了。欸，把把看着一堆人在门口坐蹲起嘲讽，拿手电转着照我，真的是欲哭无泪啊

Edit after June Anniversary Event and developer update highlighting the upcoming 40 perk overhall:
This game is not worth playing, primarily due to the incompetence of the game developers. They are completely out of touch and would rather make sexualized comments about the fictional characters in their anniversary quotes than address the inherent gameplay issues that plague their game. The upcoming perk changes showcase that the game designers are morons.

This game would be awesome, but BHVR are intent on making sure that it continues to attrit players.  In any other industry, losing 34% of your customer base in 6 months would put you out of a job, but it may actually be a part of BHVR's mission statement.

Queue times are dreadful. Be prepared for a 10-15 minute queue for a 5-8 minute game.

Hacks and cheats are plentiful and rampant. People can change their config to see the killer's bloodstain through walls. (shows where they are looking) 

The devs implement changes that they themselves declared "bad" with statements like "you do not want this" before giving up on their alternative idea and shoehorning in their self-admitted bad solution. (referring to skill based match making)

Game design decisions are hugely indicative of a development studio out of touch with the game they create.

The grind is immense. It is very unforgiving to new players, and it discourages trying out new builds. For killer players it will take 20-30 hours of played time to discover the perks for a new character. The devs stand behind a system that requires purchasing a skill you've already unlocked a total of 3 times (for each character) before it is viable. (each time you purchase the perk in the bloodweb it gains about 30% increased effectiveness on average. You will lose games with 1st and 2nd level perks that you otherwise would have had better odds.) The devs have stated months ago that they are aware that the grind is terrible, but they have put off implementing any changes as they continue to lose players and not retain any new ones. They are looking for a "permanent" solution to the grind, which I can only interpret as finding a new game to play. 

Map variety is significant, but in a bad way. Some maps are good, some maps are dreadfully designed. They have nerfed perks and strategies because they prove too strong on some poorly designed maps.

The game has a lot of potential and definitely a lot of charm! but I would not recommend giving any $$ to BHVR or to support such an incompetent development studio. Communication blows and the team leads are smug, pretentious, and with faces that evoke disgust.

Bom primeiramente, eu jogo desde 2020, eu simplesmente me apaixonei quando vi uma gameplay e não pensei duas vezes em comprar quando entrou em promoção. 
O problema é que o jogo parece estar no beta até hoje, de tão mal otimizado ser, coisa que os desenvolvedores poderiam arrumar. 
Outro problema seria escutar um pouco mais a comunidade, não apenas dar recompensas, mas sim mudanças no balanceamento e otimização do jogo.
Mas num geral, tenho carinho especial por esse jogo, vale muito a pena :)

RIchtig traurig was aus DBD geworden ist. Wer Spieler mit HIgh Ranks und Blutpunkten belohnt, welche nur Face Campen und damit allen anderen die Freude am Spiel nehmen, der muss sich nicht wundern, wenn das Spiel ausstirbt. Ich warte lieber ein paar Minuten auf eine vernünftige Lobby, als ständig 2 Minuten Spiele zu haben. Warum lasst ihr das Campen eigentlich zu? Das macht doch keinem Beteiligten Spaß.
Echt schade, das Spiel wäre verdammt suchtgefährdend, wären die Spieler und Bedingungen fair.
